title: So... an ADC and an assassin fight each other...

replies.body: Trick question; they would get drunk and then make out on the counter.

wait but Zed actually beats Syndra because he can 
1) waveclear decently
2) trade safer
3) dodge her stun
4) cancel her ult 
5) has a relatively easy time landing everything because she's an immobile battle caster

not to mention a Syndra can't 1-hit any decent ad assassin early cuz they'd recognize that she has a lot of raw damage (just like Annie or pre-rework Leblanc) and start some magic resist like a Maw or something

*on the other hand*

Zed has to land nearly everything in his kit *plus* ignite to even to kill his lane opponent in the early game...not even sure where your argument could be applied to this side of fight

so uh...ya

Shhh, keep logic away from here. 

Seriously though, people act like Zed players are just braindead button pressers
but syndra can carry the cannon into raptor camp
Yeah but zed ult can completely negate syndra ult if he times it right, then it's pretty easy to kill her

If Zed doesn't win that then he's bad. He should ult the second he sees Syndra ult, it basically invalidates her ult which is the largest amount of her damage. Plus in that match up Zed should be building edge of night or maw. Or both for that matter. There is a reason Zed is a Syndra counter.

Unless you are whining about Zed, in which case I would like to point out that you are a couple months after the QSS changes.
but syndras should wait to stun and ult till after zed ults
If syndra holds her ult and stun, she's fucked. Especially if zed dodges one of her abilities with his w.

Khazix's main issue is how after lv6 his Q basically has no cd against monsters as most of them are now isolated, he can farm way too fast and counter jungle like crazy.

you need a few wards and he can't do counter jungle, I just played a game where i was kha and I countered like crazy, killed lee 3-4 times in his own jungle, but his deaths could have easily been avoided had he or his support placed a ward at the most basic places for wards in the jungle,

if kha doesn't have a team to tank a few hits and be able to start the fights and go in then he can't do anything in teamfights as he gets one shotted by everyone because of how squishy he is, and if enemy team has a lot of cc then kha is done for

Between 100% crit, massive lifesteal, high AS, and inherent range, if an assassin cannot burst someone in like 0.5-0.8s like they should be able to, said victim will not die unless said victim is blitheringly stupid.

0.5-0.8s? Are you serious?
Do you even know how short a second is?
It take 0.25 second just for an average human to react to an EXPECTED visual stimulus. Add to that the latency, keyboard to computer delay and the time it takes to press a button on a keyboard and you are already at over a second just to react to an assassin jumping on you WHEN YOU KNOW THEY ARE GONNA DO IT.
And don't you dare blink your eyes! 0.3 to 0.4 second for a human to blink its eyes.

Anyone who thinks an assassin, or any champion for the matter, should be able to delete someone in less than 2 seconds is delusional.
idk I flash malph ults on live. I flash all kinds of skillshots. Last game it was a janna tornado. and typically you have less then a .5 second reaction time with those so..

I am not saying that ADCs CAN'T get 100% crit.

I am pointing out that they DON'T, because it is inefficient.

Do you live in a fantasy world where an ADC can casually forego boots and even a somewhat defensive item and be effective?

{{item:3508}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} 

This is how you get 100% crit. You can swap one of the other AS/Crit items for PD and SS, but these are the items necessary to get 100% crit on any champ save Yasuo or Tryndamere, and barring runes.

{{item:3072}} {{item:3036}} 

So you think you can add these two items to that build and it would be good, huh? Yeah dude, who needs boots, you can just use percentage MS to scale of the movement speed you haven't built (because ADCs have some of the lowest base MS in the game), and who needs some form of defense like mercurial scimitar or guardian's angel? I'm sure it'll work out.

Some ADCs can do without a defensive item in most games, but they all need boots. Boots make you faster, which helps you kite, which keeps you alive.
